data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=p7FAH54a1hkQ7kNvgEHnsz1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAqeCc4niuUVx0WSUqG-bD30k-eAdDP4yVYOLDeAJnmOA&oe=66D1AD9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=AIxNxdGsnMkQ7kNvgGVArFz&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAYb_MRibzzbsqc-6t3beWJ7lk93iBeXY8DvmeWv1RNHQ&oe=66D1B724)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sjWOwsYQpEcQ7kNvgH74sIN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAtmc1sUF__h0VpLMY6CJZWtnF3a6yIXUErAhs3MXSRWw&oe=66D19E87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5H8OkfhkjtAQ7kNvgH7f52D&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBuno-LyoIcG_sxvKo2yMhDA_TOiA7UJKCxmtd-sTicxw&oe=66D19166)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=E1WQdeQwDw4Q7kNvgGvlWJx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD-CZcaG2pj9f2mxNnN2TeO3SJD1By4CcqewnGpZfm1ng&oe=66D1BDD8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I4iLd7RvcJkQ7kNvgFEi-gq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAMEQ9Hr0dLzvtHyaMXwW8mr1RZS4nXYOyt_UK6-EMuKQ&oe=66D1BA59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SfXN2GWgIqUQ7kNvgHK1xFO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD4P7WUSTxpkJlZKkedOGkuxRACq298GIexh5r466Xr4A&oe=66D1A070)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sl7rNbuc_DgQ7kNvgEwfm0l&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBo6JO9w_oUj3eKDO_VcViE3n9-00ijDsdzgFPnj6DLew&oe=66D18AEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8AqBp130odYQ7kNvgG-xVjQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAzWuT4uZF1mpsnRE14BcYc7bNKiZ87HE64BLSe_Yo2Vw&oe=66D19E97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oq7dH5W6b24Q7kNvgGOsEvp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCzfrLfBm673zP7rH_rONShce7Lb7_N6zng6iX3azp05w&oe=66D1BA0C)
